short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sum up rows and columns, including if they have spaces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works only in https://www.nonograms.org/
Works for "Black & white" and "Colour" nonograms.

-  Sums rows and columns of nonogram including possible spaces.
-  Green background if its possible to start filling using overlap method.


Source code: https://github.com/intta/nonogram-sum
